channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoom Video Communications Inc -- On-Premise Meeting Connectors
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zoom Video Communications Inc -- On-Premise Meeting Connectors

item.title: CVE-2022-28749|2024-08-03T06:03:52.635Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%20inc -- on-premise%20meeting%20connectors
item.description: Zooms On-Premise Meeting Connector MMR before version 4.8.113.20220526 fails to properly check the permissions of a Zoom meeting attendee. As a result, a threat actor in the Zooms waiting room can join the meeting without the consent of the host.
